name: Card Crafter
description:
Card Crafter

A small deck builder where you craft cards into weapons to fight monsters.

Features
  • Currently there are 2 monsters to fight!
  • 8 weapons to craft!
  • Many BuGs left!
Help
  • Use the recipes button in-game to see how to craft things.
  • Space bar ends your turn.
  • Having trouble starting the game? Make sure to right click on the CardCrafterGame.Zip file and Un-Zip it then run the CardCrafter.exe.

All assets were made during the Chip'N Jam in 48 Hours!  (https://itch.io/jam/chip-n-jam)
